page.title: 08UNEMPLOYMENT IN PARR.
page.content: We approached the general public, to discover their views on unemployment. Unemployment within our area of study stands at just over 10%. However only 10% of leavers from our own school were employed in September 1984. The first question asked was, "What are your views on unemployment today?". Out of ten people, they all expreseed serious concern. We then asked the ten "What do you think causes the lack of jobs?". Answers included Government and technology. We then asked, "Should people on the dole get more money?". Seven said "Yes" and three said "No". The final question was, "What do you think of the Youth Training Scheme?". The majority concluded "slave labour".
